entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
